oai_dc:dc.dc:description: L3 X-ray absorption spectroscopic study of Eu firmly establishes that the compound, EuPd2Si2, is a mixed valence system. It is found that the relative intensities of the absorption peaks corresponding to divalent and trivalent europium ions in EuPd2Si2 are a strong function of temperature.
